answers.answer: I get this feeling on the tops of my thighs.  Feels like sandpaper was rubbed on them and to have clothing rub on the hurts like crazy!!  I have not been able to figure out what this is either.  I wish I had some answers for you, but I am glad to know I am not the only person that has this problem as my doctor was making me feel like I was.I hope you get some relief soon.

Hi,How are you?There is a possibility that your symptoms are due to peripheral neuropathy. Please get yourself screened for Vitamin B12 deficiency and diabetes.Another possibility can be excessive anxiety and sleep deprivation and migraine.Please consult a neurologist about it. Keep us posted!
